1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Animal Friendship
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm. Choose a beast that you can see within range, and it must see and hear you. If the beast's Intelligence is 4 or higher, the spell fails. Otherwise, the beast must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the spell's duration.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Bane
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Charm Person
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw, and it does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Comprehend Languages
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language that you see, but you must be touching the surface on which the words are written.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Detect Magic
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Disguise Self
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You make yourself--including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person--look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Faerie Fire
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Feather Fall
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Healing Word
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Heroism
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: A willing creature you touch is imbued with bravery. Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of each of its turns.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Hideous Laughter
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter if this spell affects it. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or fall prone, becoming incapacitated and unable to stand up for the duration.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Identify
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement to use, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any spells are affecting the item and what they are.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Illusory Script
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion that lasts for the duration. To you and any creatures you designate when you cast the spell, the writing appears normal, written in your hand, and conveys whatever meaning you intended when you wrote the text.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Longstrider
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Silent Image
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 15-foot cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems completely real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Sleep
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures).

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Speak with Animals
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration. The knowledge and awareness of many beasts is limited by their intelligence, but at a minimum, beasts can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Thunderwave
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

1stLevelBardSpells.Name: Unseen Servant
1stLevelBardSpells.Description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless, and spectral force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range.
